reviews.review_msg: I really enjoyed his lectures. Great mix of documentaries, and very clear articulation. Interesting.

Interesting topic. Not an Arch major, just an elective. Watched documentaries once a week which were actually helpful. The book was somewhat helpful. Attend lectures, although they may be boring at times. Bob is open to questions about the exams and what not. TA took it a little too seriously though when marking. Good class to learn a bit!
